Properties.Label: Campaign Id
Properties.Tooltip: Product, promo code, or slogan (eg. spring_sale). One of campaign name or campaign id are required.

Properties.Label: Source
Properties.Tooltip: Where the traffic is coming from (eg. Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, YouTube, LinkedIn, Google, Bing, Yahoo, ...)

Properties.Label: Medium
Properties.Tooltip: Which general channel the traffic came from (eg. Organic search, social, CPC, and email)

Properties.Label: Campaign
Properties.Tooltip: Product, promo code, or slogan (eg. spring_sale). One of campaign name or campaign id are required.

Properties.Label: Content
Properties.Tooltip: What type of content people clicked on (eg. an image, a sidebar link, or a menu link)

Properties.Label: Term
Properties.Tooltip: Which term they used to access the page (which keywords are driving the most traffic)
